title: Drawing, Design for Kidney-Shaped Writing Table with Open Compartments, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Kidney-Shaped Writing Table with Open Compartments
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite and pen and black ink, lower right quadrant of sheet: #2 Writing Table 3'-4" wide / Mahogany in stock
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Kidney-shaped table top with backsplash; rectangular cabinet center rear with 2 upper drawers and a niche below, flanked by 4 small open compartments; raised on 4 straight, fluted, tapering legs with carved tops.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Kidney-Shaped Writing Table with Open Compartments, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream tracing paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-244
